item.title: My first post
item.description:
This post illustrates the deployment steps for a Static Site hosted on Microsoft Azure. It is also the first time I used infrastructure as code.

Azure Static Site

Characteristics of a static site in Azure and configuration options.

Infrastrucutre as Code

Why Bicep

I chose bicep as it has access to the latest Azure APIs. I would rather be proficient in one tool than know a lot of tools a little bit. Compared to terraform, bicep is more straight forward, closer to the Azure Resource Manager and does not have weird state-change issues, like terraform can have with its state file.
